text: The 2017–18 Slovenian Second League season was the 27th edition of the Slovenian Second League. The season began on 4 August 2017 and ended on 26 May 2018. ==Competition format== Each team has played a toal of 30 matches (15 home and 15 away). Teams played two matches against each other (one home and one away). ==Teams== On 29 June 2016, the Football Association of Slovenia decided to expand the Second League from 10 teams to 16 teams for the 2017–18 season. The key for the 16 teams contesting the league was: *Relegated team from the 2016–17 Slovenian PrvaLiga (1). *Teams from second to eighth place in the 2016–17 Slovenian Second League season (7). *The best two teams from each of the four groups in the 2016–17 Slovenian Third League (8). ===Stadiums and locations=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" !
